name: 20 in 1 Golden Mega Game
overview: 20 in 1 Golden Mega Game, also known as Golden Mega 20 in 1 is an unlicensed Sega Mega Drive multi-cart. Despite its name it actually only has three games; Streets of Rage, Tetris and Rambo III. Games included: - Bare Knuckle - Street Fighting - Beach Storm - Bridge Battle - Sea Raid - Bare Action - Skyscraper Murder - Terminate War - Rambo III - Field Mission - Hero Killer - Super Killer - Mass Explosion - Castle War - Super Rambo - Drop Tetris - Rolling Brick - Twin Tetris - Turbo Tetris - Double Race
